H0.text: A lever is the tool that Jonas should also use to split the log, in addition to his sledge hammer.

H1.text: A pulley is the other tool Jonas should use, alongside his sledge hammer, to split the log.

H2.text: A wedge is the other tool that Jonas should use to split the log, in addition to his sledge hammer.

H3.text: A fulcrum is the other tool Jonas should use to split a log, given that he has a sledge hammer.

A4.text: splitting wood in conjunction with a wedge
